TopicTitle: [1.0.4] Kramax Autopilot: Course guidance and auto-land for spaceplanes (v0.2)

Articles.Content:
Thanks! Happy to see this will be updated! This is one of my favourite mods without question.

Do you think it would be possible to get this mod on Ckan at some point?

So, I've been testing this in 1.2 and it seems to work okay.  It does not play well with mechjeb however.  If I use smartass instead of stock sas, after a while of working normally, the plane will all of a sudden freeze in the manuver that it is performing.  Other than that issue...any other issues I'm having are related to the designs of my planes/space planes....

On 10/24/2016 at 8:00 PM, bsooner77 said:

So, I've been testing this in 1.2 and it seems to work okay.  It does not play well with mechjeb however.  If I use smartass instead of stock sas, after a while of working normally, the plane will all of a sudden freeze in the manuver that it is performing.  Other than that issue...any other issues I'm having are related to the designs of my planes/space planes....

If you are using smartass, is Kramax active?

Hi Everybody,

I now have an official release of Kramax Autopilot Continued:

Please move all conversations to that thread, thanks
[MOD - As @linuxgurugamer has taken over maintenance of this add-on, this thread is now closed.]
